verses.name: Ezekiel 22:14
verses.text: Can thine heart endure, or can thine hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the Lord have spoken it, and will do it.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:15
verses.text: And I will scatter thee among the heathen, and disperse thee in the countries, and will consume thy filthiness out of thee.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:16
verses.text: And thou shalt take thine inheritance in thyself in the sight of the heathen, and thou shalt know that I am the Lord.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:17
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
